items.title: Vechey's Effortless Gourmet
items.headline: This course will teach you how to cook gourmet food with style and creativity rather than measurement.
objectives_summary: After taking this course you will be able to go into the grocery store, grab a few ingredients you love, and then create a completely original recipe using the cooking techniques and flavor combination suggestions show.

Learn to make a delicious tasting apple pie from start to finish.
Learn to make a tasty treat with that extra dough.

items.title: The Basics of Vegan Cupcakes
items.headline: The perfect vegan cupcake course for beginners!  Learn the techniques you need to make cupcakes without dairy or eggs.
objectives_summary: You will learn to successfully make vegan cupcakes from scratch.
You will learn how to troubleshoot cupcakes.
You will discover a variety of frosting and filling techniques.

items.title: Cook 5 Indian Vegetarian Meals in 5 Days
items.headline: An Indian Cookery Course for absolute beginners
objectives_summary: Learn how to cook 5 Indian vegetarian dishes in total
The names of the most commonly used Indian spices
Step by step methods with full videos

items.title: The basics of a healthy raw vegan cake making
items.headline: Learn how to create and decorate a raw, sugar-free and gluten-free cake!
objectives_summary: Prepare tasty and healthy plant-based cakes on a daily basis for you and your family
Decorate a cake to make it look more attractive
Create new recipes of raw vegan cakes by combining different tastes and ingredients

items.title: 10 Easy Breakfast Recipes

objectives_summary: Prepare and cook home made food
Spice up food using different spices and option of using preferred spice.

items.title: French pastry : baking the real French croissants
items.headline: Baking cake and pastry : All the techniques to make homemade croissants you can find in French bakeries.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make real French croissants with a perfect balance of flavours.
What make the difference between a basic croissant, and the real croissant you can find in the shop window of French bakeries.
Learn secrets and technical gestures that bring up each element (dough, butter, presentation)
